attributes.action: Change the law, so that UK citizens can force an immediate General Election.
attributes.additional_details: Change the law, so that UK citizens can force a General Election. At present a vote of no confidence can only be called by parliament, leaving this majority government in an untouchable position that repeatedly breaks promises & makes decisions that are slowly destroying the country.
attributes.background: Citizens should be able to hold the government to account at all times, not just during General Elections. The law needs to be changed so that a petition of 'no confidence' to parliament, containing the signatures of at least 51% of the population means a General Election can be called immediately.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Change the law, so that UK citizens can force an immediate General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603106
